titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 4454) making appropriations for the Legislative Branch for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1995, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 103-569, by Mr. Derrick.

Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H.R. 4454. All points of order against the conference report and against its consideration are waived. The conference report shall be considered as read.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 182.

action.text: Mr. Gephardt asked unanimous consent to consider.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/29/1994--Introduced. Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H.R. 4454 (legislative branch appropriations).
